product_name: Timex Ironman Run X50 Sport Watch
long_description: This sleek watch connects wirelessly to your fitness apps so your data appears right on your wrist. You can also control your music, leaving you free to tuck your phone out of sight while working out.
short_description: This sleek watch connects wirelessly to your fitness apps so your data appears right on your wrist. You can also control your music, leaving you free to tuck your phone out of sight while working out.
